message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a great deal for both of us - you get a valuable product at a fair price, and I get a good return on my investment. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I am willing to pay $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still not quite there yet. $1,350,000 is a bit too low for me, considering the product's true value. I'm willing to come down a little further and offer you the product for $1,375,000.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident it will be a win-win situation. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. While I understand your position, I believe we can still negotiate a better deal. I am willing to pay $1,360,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be more agreeable to you.
